column2: EU ruling on $25 bln Abbott
column3: St Jude deal due by Nov. 9 BRUSSELS
column4: Oct 4 EU antitrust regulators will decide by Nov. 9 whether to clear U.S. pharmaceuticals company Abbott Laboratories' $25-billion bid for St. Jude Medical Inc aimed at helping it better compete with bigger rivals.

BRIEF-Delta Air Lines expects Sept. quarter operating margin of about 18-19 pctDelta posts smaller-than-expected fall in passenger unit revenueUPDATE 1-Delta posts smaller-than-expected fall in passenger unit revenue Oct 4 Delta Air Lines Inc reported a smaller-than-expected drop in consolidated passenger unit revenue for September and maintained its operating margin forecast for the quarter despite suffering a system outage in August.  UPDATE 1-Delta posts smaller-than-expected fall in passenger unit revenue Oct 4 Delta Air Lines Inc reported a smaller-than-expected drop in consolidated passenger unit revenue for September and maintained its operating margin forecast for the quarter despite suffering a system outage in August.
